app.title: FairMeet — Fair Meeting Scheduler for Distributed Teams
app.description: Meet fairly across time zones. Rotate obligations, protect focus, and export to calendar.

hero.badge: The New Standard for Fair Meeting Scheduling
hero.title: Meet fairly across
hero.description: Fair meeting time recommendation system for distributed teams. Distribute timezone burden equally and find optimal overlapping times.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for fair meeting scheduling

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Time Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: AI-powered algorithm analyzes team members' time zones and working hours to suggest optimal meeting times.

fairnessScore.title: Fairness Score
fairnessScore.description: Quantifies each team member's timezone burden and provides fairness scores to ensure equal distribution.

rotationSystem.title: Rotation System
rotationSystem.description: Rotates the burden of inconvenient meeting times among team members to ensure long-term fairness.

multiTimezone.title: Multi-timezone Support
multiTimezone.description: Supports all global time zones and displays meeting information in each team member's local time.

calendarIntegration.title: Calendar Integration
calendarIntegration.description: Integrates with major calendar services like Google Calendar and Outlook for one-click schedule addition.

teamSharing.title: Team Sharing
teamSharing.description: Easily share meeting suggestions with team members and manage decision processes transparently with read-only links.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your team size

fairness.a: We track the frequency of inconvenient meeting times (before 7 AM or after 9 PM) for each team member based on their local time, and distribute them equally to ensure long-term fairness for all team members.

calendars.a: We integrate with Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Apple Calendar, and other major calendar services. ICS file downloads are also supported for use with any calendar app.

freeLimits.q: What are the limitations of the free plan?
freeLimits.a: The free plan allows 1 team, up to 5 members, and 2 recommendation generations per week. For more features, please upgrade to the Pro plan.
